title: Kitty Cot – The World’s Best Cat Perch
text: Treat your cat to the best seat in the house with the Kitty Cot, the world’s best cat perch. Using four huge patented suction cups, the perch can be securely held in place anywhere there’s a window or glass. Extending from the top two suction cups are 1/8-inch heavy duty stainless steel cables that are designed to last forever. The perch is 24 inches wide and just under 14 inches deep to provide plenty of room for your pet. The Kitty Cot is lined with easy to clean rugged fabric that is comfortable yet touch enough so it can’t be chewed through by your feline friend. Your cat will love his front row seat to watch the birds fly and the squirrels climb.
